extendedInfo.description: Touch redefines how we stay in touch with close friends and family.Touch lets you:- Message your friends through Chats that feel like you are talking in person. Enjoy chatting with unlimited text, video, and voice messaging, delivery and read receipts, typing status, and top-notch speed and reliability.- Share your life with those closest to you through Experiences that make the distance fade away.Touch has been built to provide a personal, simple and powerful experience to let you maintain your closest relationships. Keep in touch with your friends on iOS, Android and BlackBerry through Touch.

reviews.title: Brings my family and friends connected to me
reviews.comment: I can easily share pictures and videos with the family group we have created so now everyone now gets to know about pic and/or vid at the sametime and not though word of mouth and I like this. Same for friends too!!
reviews.author: Stephen M

reviews.title: Good app but...
reviews.comment: Would love a way to password protect it. Anyone playing with my phone can click on it and immediately see everything.
reviews.author: Lisa S

reviews.title: Server down
reviews.comment: I to have been getting random request from people.....but also unable to connect to server all evening.....is there a problem??
reviews.author: Hazel Shellard

reviews.title: Touch server
reviews.comment: Like app other then to many issues with error of \"can\'t connect to touch server\".  This happens in the US, UK and Australia. Please fix sever error. Also to many repeat messages.
reviews.author: Scott Price

reviews.title: Can\'t block unknown friend requests.
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this app since it was PingChat, and I\'m going to have to stop using it. I\'m getting a friend request from a random person, usually a spam bot, every hour or so. There is no option to disallow friend requests from unknown sources, you are just open to every random person or company or bot. If fixed I will return, because I like the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: RonnieBoy75
reviews.comment: I really like this app...not bad and it doesn\'t crash...but KIK has more benefits. ..on  KIK my name is at the top. ..message me I do any kind of chat I do pics lol....I\'m on every day and night (even now lol) must b 14 and older.....wht ever chat u wanna do...tell me when u message me...and if u have questions I can help u...if u arnt on KIK then my touch is  ..Ronnie Mixon...message me
reviews.author: karon mixon

reviews.title: Stop Trying to Make Fetch Happen
reviews.comment: Since I switched phones, Touch has been unable to sign on. Says \"Fetching your account information\" when I try to sign on, but clearly fetch is not going to happen. It never gets passed 0%...
reviews.author: Alex Aguilar

reviews.title: This app sucks.
reviews.comment: Too many bugs yet they choose to make new features with more bugs for every update instead of fixing what they\'ve got. Would be better if they\'d work on it.
reviews.author: Savanna Paige

reviews.title: Spamming friend request
reviews.comment: I got a lot of friend request every day from girls. I didn\'t know who she isn although i accepted or not, that id will disappeared within 24 hours. That\'s annoying me very much!
reviews.author: Yen Nguyen

reviews.title: It works great
reviews.comment: The app works great. I like how many ppl you can have in a chat window. But until i can turn off the friend requests i wont give it better than 1 star. 15 or more \'friend requests\' from sleazy bimbos who have no reason to request me daily gets annoying fast.
reviews.author: Terri Matczak

reviews.title: Rubbish app
reviews.comment: Why does it keep on telling me to check my connection. My connection is fine. This app is faulty. Fix it now please cause its annoying the hell out of me. Thankyou.
reviews.author: Jessica Philp

reviews.title: Message any OS
reviews.comment: I have friends on blackberry, iPhairy, WebOS Android... it\'s important two keep up with everyone and at the time. The touch app makes that possible. I would like to see them allow us to pick the notification sound instead of the typical ping chat default sound.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Add this feature to get 5 stars
reviews.comment: When i create an experience, I can only add people to it, but I can\'t remove a person from the experience. Everything else is great, so please add this feature.
reviews.author: Mahmodul Hassan

reviews.title: Random friend requests
reviews.comment: I too and my partner are getting random friend requests from what looks like porn!we have used this app since it was pingchat.how are these people even getting to ask me to be a friend??unsure about using this app from now on and we use it alot!
reviews.author: debbie o connell

reviews.title: Cannot add pictures or sounds or videos.
reviews.comment: Would be 5 star if I could add pics, my alliance in kingdoms of camelot use this a lot but it severley hampers my ability to communicate. I need you to fix this please. No sound add either, I cant change my name, only profile picture. Im using a sony tablet.
reviews.author: Jason Grundy

reviews.title: Nice but...
reviews.comment: There\'s a bug in which I can\'t see any of the pics my friends put up in Experiences. Also I\'m not able to set a profile pic as there always is a error message popping up. I don\'t know whether it\'s just my phone or this app, plz fix!
reviews.author: Manoharrini Thamilarasan

reviews.title: its ok
reviews.comment: every day I have trouble connecting due to issue with the server. no issue my end. agree with the spam friend requests too
reviews.author: Shannon Annear

reviews.title: TROUBLE CONNECTING TO SERVER
reviews.comment: I try to log in and says, no internet connection. Trouble.connecting to server. Please check your internet connection. Its not my internet connection, all my other apps work! PLEASE FIX!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Amy b

reviews.title: Great for galaxy s3
reviews.comment: Seems to me most issues I had with it were fixed with the last update. Love that it tells you if the person read your message.  Would like options on notification sounds please.  :)
reviews.author: Jennifer Harrell

reviews.title: Good but too much spam
reviews.comment: I use this as it works on none 3G devices compared to whatsapp  the only trouble is, that more spam is being received, you can\'t remove inappropriate users that have somehow been added to your friends list.  Needs better security and allow better administration from end-user
reviews.author: A Google User
